name: Black Sludge
description: At the start of the Round, you heal 1 HP and use up one of the charges if you are hurt. Additionally on your turn, you can use your free action to use another charge and regain 1 additional HP. This item has 10 charges that restores at the end of the quest. /n Non-poison-tupes take 2 damage at the end of the round instead while holding this.
